messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for internet setting issues.
How to fix Telenor internet setting problems?
What to do if my Telenor internet settings aren't working?
How can I correct issues with Telenor internet settings?
For Telenor internet settings, type 'Internet' and send to 131. For more details, visit: https://www.telenor.com.pk/value-added-services/balance-inquiry/
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for tracking customer service complaints.
HOW I CAN CHECK REMARKS/UPDATE OF MY LAST COMPLAINT?
Where can I see updates on the complaint I filed with Telenor?
How do I track the status of my recent Telenor service complaint?

If you have lodged a complaint yourself through the My Telenor app, you can check the remarks in the My Telenor app; alternately, you can contact our Telenor helpline at 345 (UAN number 042111345100).
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for SIM number inquiries.
How to check Telenor SIM number?
Can you tell me how to find out my Telenor SIM number?
What's the method to check my SIM number for Telenor?
Call with the same SIM on 7421 for number inquiry or you can also call our Telenor helpline at 345 or (UAN 042111345100).
